content.description: Consider the following description of method min.
content.question: public int min(int first, int second) â€“ Returns the lesser of its two parameters. Assume that each of the following expressions appears in a method in the same class as the method min. Assume also that the int variables p, q, and r have been properly declared and initialized. Which of the following expressions evaluates to the minimum value among p, q, and r? min(min(p, q), r) min(p, min(q, r)) min(min(p, q), p)

skill.text: 2.C: Write program code involving procedural abstractions.
